snippet: A former paramedic in West, where a fertilizer plant explosion killed 15 people, was sentenced to 21 months in prison after pleading guilty in an unrelated pipe bomb case.
abstract: Bryce Reed, former paramedic in West, Tex, where fertilizer explosion killed 15 people, is sentenced to 21 months in prison after pleading guilty in unrelated pipe bomb case.
lead_paragraph: A former paramedic in West, where a fertilizer plant explosion killed 15 people, was sentenced to 21 months in prison after pleading guilty in an unrelated pipe bomb case.

headline.main: Texas: Paramedic Gets Jail Term in Pipe Bomb Case
headline.print_headline: Texas: Paramedic Gets Jail Term In Pipe Bomb Case
